name: withdraw
description: Withdraw tokens to an external wallet

options.name: amount
options.description: Amount to send, in tokens (not dollars)

options.name: ticker
options.description: Token ticker symbol - Example: ETH for Ethereum

options.name: address
options.description: Address of the wallet to send to

options.name: confirm
options.description: Leave this blank to preview the transaction. Type 'yes' to confirm it.
